item.title: PRISM: A Personality-Driven Multi-Agent Framework for Social Media Simulation
item.description: arXiv:2512.19933v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Traditional agent-based models (ABMs) of opinion dynamics often fail to capture the psychological heterogeneity driving online polarization due to simplistic homogeneity assumptions.
